metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10165 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The Type_MLU_Read function in cmstypes.c in Little CMS (aka lcms2) allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information or cause a denial of service via an image with a crafted ICC profile, which triggers an out-of-bounds heap read.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblcms2-2 - 2.6-3ubuntu2.1
liblcms2-utils - 2.6-3ubuntu2.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: sbeattie> openjdk-7 as of 7u111-2.6.7 uses embedded copy of lcms2 (see http://icedtea.classpath.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=1896)

criterions.comment: lcms2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6-3ubuntu2.1').
